text:
I have a group of styles for my module and I want to apply them in a template.html. This should work right?

styles= { background_option= { full_width_background: “false” }
Group name of style option > style field

Hi all, I’m having trouble uploading files from my local dev environment to the Design Manager. I run
```hs upload --account=<name> <src> <dest>```
 and I even got the success message but my files aren’t appearing in the Design Manager.
